Public Member Functions

subroutine zero_advective_flux (flux_lo, flux_hi, conc_lo, conc_hi, flow_lo, flow_hi, ncell, nvar, time, dt, dx)
 Example advective flux that imposes Neumann boundaries with zero flux at both ends of the channel.
subroutine uninitialized_advection_bc (flux_lo, flux_hi, conc_lo, conc_hi, flow_lo, flow_hi, ncell, nvar, time, dt, dx)
 Example uninitialize that prints an error and bails.

Public Attributes

procedure(boundary_advective_flux_if),
pointer 		advection_boundary_flux = > null()
 This pointer should be set by the driver or client code to specify the treatment at the advection boundary condition.

Detailed Description

boundary advection interface to be fulfilled by driver or application

real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  conc_lo,

real(stm_real), intent(in)  dt,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dx 
)

Example uninitialize that prints an error and bails.

Parameters:
[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]nvarNumber of variables
[in,out]flux_loFlux on lo side of cell, time centered
[in,out]flux_hiFlux on hi side of cell, time centered
[in]flow_loFlow on lo side of cells centered in time
[in]flow_hiFlow on hi side of cells centered in time
[in]conc_loConcentration extrapolated to lo face
[in]conc_hiConcentration extrapolated to hi face
[in]timeCurrent time
[in]dxSpatial step
[in]dtTime step
